name: xml-validator
title: XML Validator
description: Validate XML files against XSD schemas for well-formedness and compliance
content:
Overview

This application validates XML files for well-formedness and optionally against XSD schemas. Built using lxml, it provides detailed validation reports with error messages and line numbers.

Features

  • Check XML well-formedness
  • Validate against XSD schemas (optional)
  • Detailed error reporting with line numbers
  • Generate validation reports
  • UTF-8 encoding support

Parameters

  • XML File: Upload the XML file to validate
  • XSD Schema File: (Optional) Upload schema for validation
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for the validation report

Output

The application generates a validation report file named {original_name}_validation_report.txt containing the results of the validation process.

Use Cases

  • Validating configuration files
  • Checking XML API responses
  • Verifying data integrity
  • Testing XML generation pipelines
command: REPO_DIR="prod_apps_${RANDOM}_${RANDOM}"; rm -rf "$REPO_DIR" 2>/dev/null || true; git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git "$REPO_DIR" && python "$REPO_DIR/python/xml_validator.py" "${xmlPath}" -s "${schemaPath}" -o "${outputDir}"
